entities.name: Systran SAS
entities.description: A company offering cloud translation services and a marketplace.
keyStrengths: Strong value proposition for each plan
entities.growthStrategySummary: Focus on the Cloud offer; Complementary and gradual pricing to appeal to all clients; paving the way for significant upselling over time

keyInvestmentHighlights: Strong value proposition for each plan, paving the way for significant upselling over time

entities.name: Cloud offer
entities.description: Core offering of Systran, includes various plans for translation services.

entities.name: Lite plan
entities.description: Translation of text, Word, Excel & PowerPoint files; 50 languages; 1 user.
entities.pricingModelInfo: Pricing per user; Limited amount of translation volumes; Possibility to pay less with an annual commitment

entities.name: Plus plan
entities.description: Lite plan features and additional users, larger translation volumes, PDF translation, etc.
entities.pricingModelInfo: Pricing per user; Limited amount of translation volumes; Possibility to pay less with an annual commitment

entities.name: Premium plan
entities.description: Plus plan features and CAT/TMS Connectors, larger translation volumes, etc.
entities.pricingModelInfo: Pricing per user; Limited amount of translation volumes; Possibility to pay less with an annual commitment

entities.name: Developer plan
entities.pricingModelInfo: Pricing per user; Annual commitment only; Possibility to pay to increase translation volumes

entities.name: Infinite plan
entities.description: Consumption-based pricing for very large translation volumes (potentially unlimited).
entities.pricingModelInfo: Pricing per user; Annual commitment only; Possibility to pay to increase translation volumes

entities.name: Marketplace
entities.description: Models can be generated by Systran Cloud Users, who then deploy it on the Marketplace.

entities.name: CAT/TMS Connectors
entities.description: Connectors for Computer-Assisted Translation / Translation Management Systems.

entities.name: ChapsVision
entities.description: Owner or recipient of the confidential document.

entities.name: Systran Cloud Users
entities.description: Users who generate and deploy models on the Systran Marketplace.
